pages.text: $(li)These passive creatures can be found in the Maple Forest of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can attract them using Red or Brown Mushrooms.$(br)$(li)If you give a Red or Brown Mushroom to a Snail, it will place on the ground Snail Slime. If you broke this block, you will obtain Snail Slime.
Snails are a little shy, when we are close to them, they will hide under their shells, gaining +20 resistance.
$(li)You can bred Snails give them Mushroom Stews.$(br)$(li)When they grows to Adults Snails, they drop a Snail Shell Piece.
